TopicTitle: A modern Fighter Jet parts pack?

Articles.Content: I think this is the right place to put this. Does anybody know of a modern fighter parts pack for KSP? I saw somebody's screenshot, and they had magnificent jet plane parts, and he never responded when I asked. Anybody know of one?
Firespitter has some, I think.
link the screenshot. it'll be easier to identify

Firespitter has some, I think.

FIrespitter has old fighter parts, like Biplanes, and p-51s. I'm looking for modern fighters.

link the screenshot. it'll be easier to identify

Yeah, i've been searching for it. Gimme a bit

I believe this is it, although my schools internet blocks the photo for me. Let me know if its actually pictures of a jet.

http://imgur.com/a/0LkP4

the vehicle weapons are skillful weapons mod; not sure what mod the truck cabins are from. Su wings are procedural Wings; body is mix of stock; KW rocketry tanks. not familiar with the cockpit, could be firespitter. don't know here the landing gears are from, there're some landing gear mods, but don't recall their names.
Yeah I knew about skillful. I just remember the cockpit, and landing gear, and assumed it was from a Fighter pack. The cockpit is not firespitter, i can say for sure.
Also, I know about B9's fighter like cockpit, wings, and body. But they are generic. I mean fighter parts like that cockpit. Anyone know of any mod like that?
no that I know if. that cockpit is a few different parts clipped together, might be scaled as well. could be a custom job using MODEL{} nodes.
Cockpit is Sam Hall's Kerbonov cockpit, I think.
@NathanKell, no I don't think it is. Looks like it at first glance, but I'm pretty sure that's a Firespitter helicopter cockpit with the nosecone clipped onto the front.

Yeah I knew about skillful. I just remember the cockpit, and landing gear, and assumed it was from a Fighter pack. The cockpit is not firespitter, i can say for sure.

It is a firespitter cockpit, it is the UH-1 or KH-1 Huey helicopter cockpit clipped into another part.

The landing gear are from the KAX plugin.

The trucks are mostly from the Touhou Torpedo Wheels and ICE engines pack. It is now dead, and no longer for download.

((you can find it if you look hard enough.))
I sit corrected

Crap! Just got home and checked the images and thats not it! I'll search some more for the pic. Sorry! I can definitely tell that's firespitter. For fact. Sorry for those of you I corrected. Thought i had the right image! (for those who mised it, my school blocked the images so i had to guess)

Edited August 28, 2014 by Endersmens
looks more like the dognose cockpit

Found It! There should be no confusion this time.

Now, can anyone tell me the mods he used on this plane? Ones I recognize: Skillful, lazor system weapons.
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29932-Mysterious-Projects-Falcon-IVA-HUD

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29932-Mysterious-Projects-Falcon-IVA-HUD

Thank you so much! I'm gonna get Pwings and have so much fun!

Thank you so much! I'm gonna get Pwings and have so much fun!

That mod works great in stock KSP but not at all in FAR.

That mod works great in stock KSP but not at all in FAR.

The fighter? Or Pwings?

The fighter? Or Pwings?

The Falcon mod.
I heard about that on the forums. I'm assuming this means the wings are part of that mod?
